long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to temporarily block any website you want. In the age of technology, the constant barrage of notifications, messages, and digital content has significantly shortened our attention spans. As we juggle multiple tasks and navigate through endless streams of information, staying focused has become increasingly challenging. We hope this extension will allow individuals to concentrate better, enhancing productivity and enabling deeper, more sustained focus on important tasks.
